snippet: A state court judge in San Francisco on Wednesday ordered the destruction of five frozen embryos after a man challenged his ex-wife’s right to use them.
abstract: California Judge Anne-Christine Massullo upholds 2010 marriage agreement between Mimi C Lee and her ex-husband Stephen Findley, and orders destruction of five frozen embryos; couple had agreed to destroy embryos if they divorced, but Lee has argued that a bout with cancer has let her unable to have children; ruling is consistent with past ones made across country regarding status of embryos following divorce.
lead_paragraph: A state court judge in San Francisco on Wednesday ordered the destruction of five frozen embryos after a man challenged his ex-wife’s right to use them.

headline.main: California Judge Orders Frozen Embryos Destroyed
headline.print_headline: California Judge Orders Frozen Embryos Destroyed
